mapper.select: SELECT rmr.roompay_mileage_rate_code, rmr.member_id, rmr.mileage_grade_name, rmr.payment_criteria_mileage_percent, rmr.payment_criteria_upgrade, rmr.mileage_rate_register_date FROM roompay_mileage_rate AS rmr;
mapper.insert:
/* roompay_mileage_rate_code 자동증가 */ SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(rmr.roompay_mileage_rate_code) = 0 THEN 'roompay_mileage01' ELSE CONCAT('roompay_mileage0',(MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(rmr.roompay_mileage_rate_code,'roompay_mileage', -1) AS UNSIGNED))+1)) END AS roompayMileageRateCode FROM roompay_mileage_rate as rmr;
/* 결제적립금 기준 등록 */ INSERT INTO roompay_mileage_rate (roompay_mileage_rate_code, member_id, mileage_grade_name, payment_criteria_mileage_percent, payment_criteria_upgrade, mileage_rate_register_date) VALUES (#{roompayMileageRateCode}, #{memberId}, #{mileageGradeName}, #{paymentCriteriaMileagePercent}, #{paymentCriteriaUpgrade}, CURDATE())
mapper.select: /* 특정코드로 결제적립금 기준 조회*/ SELECT rmr.roompay_mileage_rate_code, rmr.member_id, rmr.mileage_grade_name, rmr.payment_criteria_mileage_percent, rmr.payment_criteria_upgrade, rmr.mileage_rate_register_date FROM roompay_mileage_rate AS rmr WHERE rmr.roompay_mileage_rate_code = #{roompayMileageRateCode};
